typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudsalesCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudsalesAddresses
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomers
CloudsalesCustomers derive(SourceSystemId = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> NewColsAddedCloudsales
CloudsalesAddresses derive(SourceSystemId = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr
NewColsAddedCloudsales, NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr join(CloudsalesCustomers@CustomerID == CloudsalesAddresses@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CloudsalesCustomerAddr
CloudsalesCustomerAddr derive(CustomerCreatedDate = iif(CloudsalesCustomers@CreatedDate>CloudsalesAddresses@CreatedDate,CloudsalesCustomers@CreatedDate,CloudsalesAddresses@CreatedDate),
		CustomerUpdatedDate = iif(CloudsalesCustomers@UpdatedDate>CloudsalesAddresses@UpdatedDate,CloudsalesCustomers@UpdatedDate,CloudsalesAddresses@UpdatedDate )) ~> DateColumns
DateColumns select(mapColumn(
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		SourceSystemCustomerID = NewColsAddedCloudsales@GlobalCustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		SourceSystemIdID = NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr@SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID = NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr@GlobalCustomerID,
		CustomerCreatedDate,
		CustomerUpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CloudsalesCustomerAddresses
CloudsalesCustomerAddresses sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customers
